## ScalarOperations.getMultiplicativeInverse() method

Returns the unique scalar that, when multiplied by `scalar`<!-- -->, returns the multiplicative identity

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
abstract getMultiplicativeInverse(x: S): S | undefined;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  x | <code>S</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`S | undefined`

The multiplicative inverse

## Example


```
multiplyScalars(scalar, getMultiplicativeInverse(scalar)) === getMultiplicativeIdentity()

```
is true for `scalar`
